Description.Text: Situated in the heart of the majestic Northern Drakensberg, the hotel is less than 4 hours' drive from either Johannesburg or Durban. More than 40 km from the nearest town, this hotel with its spectacular mountain views is the ideal way to experience the wonders of the Amphitheatre and Natal National Park. Durban International Airport is some 278 km from the hotel.

Situated in the Northern Drakensberg, the hotel welcomes guests from all over the world. The entrance and lounge area of this hotel personify the warmth of the peaceful surroundings, so typical of the famous Drakensberg community. Fully air-conditioned, the club resort offers 107 guest rooms as well as a lobby, bar, restaurant, conference facilities and room service. Guests arriving by car may leave their vehicle in the car park.
